Modal.title: Create Organization
Modal.subtitle: Looks like you don't have an organization yet, fill in the required fields below to create one.

name.label: Name
name.hint: Your organization's name will need to be unique accross the whole platform; we'll take care of making sure it is.
name.required: A name is required to create an organization.

adminRoleName.label: Administrator Role Name
adminRoleName.hint: The name of the role which will grant access to managing your organization. You'll be assigned this role once creation is complete.
adminRoleName.required: A name is required to create an organization.
